Title: A Little Devil Complex
Writer: Michael Brandt (developed by), Derek Haas (developed by), Dick Wolf (created by), Matt Olmstead (created by), Michael Brandt, Derek Haas
Actors: Jason Beghe, Jon Seda, Sophia Bush, Jesse Lee Soffer
Plot: Antonio and his sister talk to Elliot Gish about the person they think is responsible for the fire that killed Shay; Lindsay has second thoughts about the task force; Platt's new, sunny demeanor results in curiosity.
